name: Star Jammer
description:
No one knows why you're wearing a space suit. No one knows why you're trapped in a derelict yet booby-trapped installation, yet here we are.

Star Jammer is a run and gun platformer made for GB30 Jam. The goal is to find the exit on each of the 3 levels. Many hazards and obstacles stand in the way as does the possibility of getting thoroughly lost. Visit the shop whenever you can.

Look for the number 30 and a rubber duck.

Controls
Keyboard
Move - ARROW KEYS
Jump - X
Shoot - C

Xbox Gamepad
Move - LEFT STICK
Shoot - A
Jump - B

Contact
